features: Heavy-Duty: Abrasion-resistant 1,000D fabric can handle everything from freezing to boiling, and is now hydrophobic and lighter than before.
Better Tasting: New food-grade lining ensures better tasting water.
Redesigned Cap: New lower-profle 3-in-1 cap lets you fll, drink, and pour with greater ease.
Improved Attachment: Streamlined webbing and new grommet locations improve pack attachment and hanging.
